channel.title: Use item on npc
channel.description: Ok I am trying to make it so I can use an item on a npc. I want to be able use a harpoon on a fishing portal. In my server the fishing portal is an npc. What I need is a code that I can use to make it so if I use a harpooon(311) on npc id 233. And I want it to give me a raw manta ray. Also you need a 90 fishing to do it and it gives you like 200 xp. I have tried to find a code for it so can any1 help me out with a start to the code.

item.title: Use item on npc
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Ok I am trying to make it so I can use an item on a npc. I want to be able use a harpoon on a fishing portal. In my server the fishing portal is an npc. What I need is a code that I can use to make it so if I use a harpooon(311) on npc id 233. And I want it to give me a raw manta ray. Also you need a 90 fishing to do it and it gives you like 200 xp. I have tried to find a code for it so can any1 help me out with a start to the code.
